name: Medieval Madness (TaBoO_Chris, Mozri, Lucien Morcrette)
description:
In Medieval Madness, you incarnate a immortal-human-being that has to protect a group of civils from Monsters. You have access to multiple power from Fireballs to a Scythe. You are immortal but the looks of the Dead Civilian will make your Brain (and your Power) bursts.

This game is played with a controller.
